text: Chris Furrh (born December 18, 1974) is an American actor. He was born in San Marcos, Texas. He is most famous for starring as Jack in the 1990 movie version of Lord of the Flies. After Lord of the Flies, he played the role of Nick Bankston in the 1990 television movie A Family for Joe. He played another castaway teenager in Exile. Furrh has since retired from acting. ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Texas Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors
title: Chris Furrh
